turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: I'm trying to schedule an appointment with Dr. Ramirez, but your online system is giving me fits. I've been clicking around for 20 minutes! Can you help?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: I understand your frustration. I can definitely assist you with scheduling an appointment with Dr. Ramirez. To start, could you please provide me with your full name and date of birth?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Sure, it's Jane Doe, and my birthday is January 15, 1988. What's the soonest I can see her? And, just out of curiosity, why *is* the online system so awful? Is it being updated or something?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Thank you, Ms. Doe. The soonest available appointment with Dr. Ramirez is next Tuesday, November 7th, at 2:00 PM. Would that time work for you? As for the online system, we are aware of some recent issues and our IT department is actively working to resolve them. I apologize for any inconvenience it may have caused.
